answers.answer: I have type 2 diabetes. Its Hard To keep my sugar levels normal. This is my first pregnancy as a diabetic. I have 4 girls already.  I was really skinny with the other 4 and this one I am over weight. I heard that babies are bigger when you have diabetes and pregnant. I sure hope this baby doesn't get it

question: Has any one had gestational diabetes? this is my 2nd girl and first time having it which I am overweight this time.  Did you have it after? Did your baby get it? Was your baby born big?
title: gestational diabetes
